Question
========

One tests H~1~: p = 0.5 against H~2~: p = 0.2 in a random sample of n = 10 observations. Testing quantity is the binomially distributed stochast B, the number of successes in the sample. As the left critical limit, the value 2 is used. The discernment power 1 - Î² is then equal to

----------

* 0.84
* 0.9
* 0.99

Solution
========

Answerlist
